alert.note: Alert for Greenwood; Laurens (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 10:45AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Laurens and central Greenwood Counties through 1130 AM EDT... At 1044 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of Greenwood, or near Lake Greenwood, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Laurens, Greenwood, Clinton, Ninety Six, Joanna, Cross Hill, Waterloo, Lake Greenwood State Park, Lake Greenwood and Greenwood State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
